title: Sporty design
content: Its slim frame design gives the Roadster its sporty character: the frameâ€™s sleek design is reminiscent of conventional bikes, while it meets the highest standards of outstanding German engineering. The Bosch Performance Line CX motor, boasting 85 Nm, and the integrated battery with 625 Wh are installed in a balanced position for top agility and riding enjoyment. The integrated cabling accentuates the linear appearance..
